Description: Creates a trail of spikes that start from the player and go out in a straight line for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">8m</font> dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.610000 * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_ice_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage. The final spike is a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">Mighty Spike</font> that will deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[1.570000 * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_ice_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">pushing</font> back enemies. Pressing basic attack before the path fully forms will spawn the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">Mighty Spike</font> early.\n\nCost <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[15.000000]}</font> mana.

Cooldown for this ability reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[-0.100000 * -100]}% </font> if an enemy is hit by the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">Mighty Spike</font>.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">Mighty Spike</font> damage increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.200000 * 100]}%</font> when hitting an enemy below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[30.000000]}%</font> health.

Increases damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">10%</font> and adds <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">stagger</font> to the path of spikes. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Does not increase Mighty Spike damage.)</font>

Ice shards fire from the sides of the <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">Mighty Spike</font> to hit a wider area.  Each shard has a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">6m</font> range and deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[1.180000 * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_ice_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage.

Ice Storm damage is increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.100000 * 100]}%</font> to enemies below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[50.000000]}%</font> health.
Ice Storm mana cost is decreased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">80%</font> while at full mana.

Increases Ice Storm damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.100000 * 100]}%</font> for each enemy in Ice Storm. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#808080">(Max {[5.000000]} targets.)</font>
Increase duration of Wind Chill by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">1s</font>.

Increase the damage of the last <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">2m</font> of the Wind Chill range by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.250000 * 100]}%</font>.

Increase damage of basic attacks by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.150000 * 100]}%</font> for targets within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[15.000000]}m</font> of player.
Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.150000 * 100]}</font> mana whenever you critically hit a target.
Increase critical damage of ice gauntlet abilities by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.100000 * 100]}%</font> while stamina is full.

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.150000 * 100]}</font> mana whenever you hit with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[3.000000]}</font> consecutive light attacks.

Increase <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">critical chance</font> by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.150000 * 100]}%</font> when hitting an enemy in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">frosted area</font> or when hitting an enemy with <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">frostbite</font>.

Heavy attacks will <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">root</font> a target for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[1.000000]}s</font> if they are standing in Ice Storm or have <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">frostbite</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(This effect has a {[4.000000]}s cooldown after root expires.)</font>

Ice gauntlet abilities <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">chill</font> targets, increasing ice damage dealt to the target by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.250000 * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[3.000000]}s</font>. Ice Pylon attacks do not apply chill.

Place a pylon that fires ice projectiles at enemies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">20m</font>. Projectiles deal <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.750000 * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_ice_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage if they hit. Ice Pylon health will be <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">20%</font> of players max health. Ice Pylon creates a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">1m</font> radius <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">frosted area</font> around itself and lasts for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">15s</font> unless it is destroyed. Hold ability input for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">1s</font> to despawn Ice Pylon.\n\nCost <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[15.000000]}</font> mana.

Increases damage of Ice Pylon by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.100000 * 100]}%</font> against <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">slowed</font> targets.
Ice Pylon regenerates to full health <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[5.000000]}s</font> after last damage taken.
Dodging increases Ice Pylon rate of fire for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">3s</font>.

A successful hit from the Ice Pylon extends its lifetime by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">1s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Maximum {[45.000000]}s.)</font>
Increase Ice Shower duration to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">7s</font>.

Any ally, including self, will get a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.250000 * 100]}% haste</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[2.000000]}s</font> when entering Ice Shower.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">Frostbite</font> applies <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">rend</font> to target, reducing their defense by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[-0.100000 * -100]}%</font>.

Entomb yourself in ice to become <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">invulnerable</font> and greatly increase mana regeneration. The tomb lasts for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">10s</font> but can be destroyed early. Tomb health will be <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">50%</font> of players max health.

Press ability input, block, or dodge to exit the tomb normally or press basic attack to exit while causing a damaging <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">push</font> at the cost of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[10.000000]}</font> mana. The <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">push</font> deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.700000 * 100]}%</font> <img src="lyshineui/images/icons/tooltip/icon_tooltip_ice_opaque" xPadding="4" scale="1.7" yOffset="4"></img>weapon damage to enemies in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">3m</font> radius.

Cost <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.000000]}</font> mana.

Gain a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.250000 * 100]}% fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[3.000000]}s</font> after breaking out of Entombed. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Fortify increases armor.)</font>
Cleanse all <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">debuffs</font> when Entombed activates.

Blocking an attack with the ice gauntlet will convert mana to stamina. Converts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[-5.000000 * -1]}</font> mana to  <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[10.000000]}</font> stamina.

Increase movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.100000 * 100]}%</font> in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">frosted area</font>.

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[6.000000]}</font> mana for each attack performed while in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">frosted area</font>.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">Slow</font> enemies by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[-0.250000 * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[4.000000]}s</font> when they hit you with a melee attack while your health is full. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Slow reduces target's movement speed.)</font>

Reduce the cooldown of all ice gauntlet abilities by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[-0.200000 * -100]}%</font> when casting an ability in a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">frosted area</font>.

Casting an ice gauntlet ability grants a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[0.200000 * 100]}% fortify</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">{[2.000000]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Fortify increases armor.)</font>

Doubles Ice Pylon's health and extends Ice Pylon's <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">frosted area</font> radius to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">5m</font>.  Standing in this <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#edc63e">frosted area</font> doubles Quick Frost and Empowered Frost bonuses.
